citations.narrative:
The perimeter fence was damaged by a storm and is bent inward touching the caracal enclosure. Due to the angle of the
fence, it is no longer 6 feet high in this section and no longer 3 feet away from the primary enclosure. This section of the
fence needs to be addressed to be maintained in good repair and to meet the requirements of this subpart for the safety
and containment of the animals.
Correct by: April 18, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
The perimeter fence was damaged by a storm and is bent inward touching the caracal enclosure. Due to the angle of the 
fence, it is no longer 6 feet high in this section and no longer 3 feet away from the primary enclosure. This section of the 
fence needs to be addressed to be maintained in good repair and to meet the requirements of this subpart for the safety 
and containment of the animals.  
 
Correct by: April 18, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
